predictions.text: Alphabet (GOOGL) Q3 2025 total revenue growth (YoY) will be between 10% and 14%, per the company’s earnings release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify against Alphabet’s Q3 2025 earnings release or Form 8-K; calculate year-over-year growth percentage for total revenue and confirm it lies within [10%, 14%].
monitoring_signals: Third-party ad spend trackers (Pathmatics, Skai) for Q3 trends
YouTube ad price/fill-rate commentary from agencies
Search ad auction intensity and click-volume indices
predictions.rationale: Search and YouTube demand remained resilient; cloud improves but not decisive for total growth. Competitive headlines unlikely to impact already-completed Q3.

predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing New Orders Index for October 2025 will print at or below 50.5.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the October 2025 ISM Manufacturing Report on Business; use the New Orders subindex headline value and verify it is ≤ 50.5.
monitoring_signals: Regional Fed manufacturing new orders (Philly, Empire, Richmond)
S&P Global US Manufacturing PMI New Orders
Export orders in ISM and S&P Global surveys
predictions.rationale: Industry data show soft orders amid cautious inventory management and weak external demand.

predictions.text: Euro area unemployment rate (Eurostat) for September 2025 will print between 6.4% and 6.7%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check Eurostat’s monthly unemployment rate release for September 2025; confirm the seasonally adjusted euro area rate is within [6.4%, 6.7%].
monitoring_signals: Euro area composite PMI employment subindices
National unemployment updates (DE, FR, IT, ES)
Online job postings indices (e.g., Indeed Hiring Lab EU)
predictions.rationale: Euro labor markets remain tight but easing gradually; recent prints anchored near mid-6s.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI Used Cars and Trucks (MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between -1.2% and +0.3% in the BLS release.
predictions.verification_criteria: In the October 2025 CPI release, use the Used Cars and Trucks index (BLS item series) and compute seasonally adjusted MoM; verify it lies within [-1.2%, +0.3%].
monitoring_signals: Manheim Used Vehicle Value Index (M/M SA)
Auction conversion rates and floor prices
Auto loan delinquencies and dealer inventory days’ supply
predictions.rationale: Auction data remain soft; retail prices lag wholesale declines, keeping downward pressure on CPI used vehicles.

predictions.text: United Kingdom CPI (YoY, headline) for October 2025 will print between 2.9% and 3.5%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via ONS CPI bulletin for October 2025; confirm the all-items CPI annual rate is within [2.9%, 3.5%].
monitoring_signals: Energy cap adjustments and utility tariffs
Food CPI momentum in Kantar grocery data
Services inflation from PMI and wage growth metrics
predictions.rationale: Energy base effects fade while services stay sticky; headline likely holds near 3%.

predictions.text: ICE BofA MOVE Index will close at or below 95.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm a daily close for the ICE BofA MOVE Index ≤ 95.0 using ICE Indices or FRED data; any single trading day satisfies.
monitoring_signals: Treasury yields’ intraday ranges and realized vol
Fed communications and data surprises (CPI, payrolls)
Auction tails and bid-to-cover ratios
predictions.rationale: Near-term event risks fade post-data; vol mean-reverts as path of policy becomes clearer.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or below €38.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE Endex official settlement for the front-month TTF futures; confirm any settlement ≤ €38.00/MWh by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: EU storage fill levels (AGSI+)
Weather forecasts (HDD/temperature anomalies)
Norway/LNG supply outages and regas utilization
predictions.rationale: High EU storage and shoulder-season demand temper price spikes barring major supply disruptions.

predictions.text: ICE U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) will close at or above 107.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm a daily close ≥ 107.00 for DXY using ICE or Yahoo Finance (^DXY) with UTC-based trading day.
monitoring_signals: Rate differentials (UST vs G10) and front-end OIS
Global risk sentiment (VIX, equities)
U.S. data surprises relative to G10 peers
predictions.rationale: Resilient U.S. data and higher relative yields can push DXY to test prior highs.

predictions.text: U.S. crude oil field production (weekly, EIA) will print at or above 13.40 million barrels per day in at least one Weekly Petroleum Status Report by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report; confirm the “U.S. Field Production of Crude Oil” weekly estimate is ≥ 13.40 mb/d in any report before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Rig counts and DUC trends
Permian pipeline takeaway utilization
EIA 914 monthly reconciliations and revisions
predictions.rationale: Productivity gains and Permian strength support incremental weekly highs despite flat rig counts.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-22 close to 2025-11-30 close, Tesla (TSLA) will underperform Invesco QQQ Trust (QQQ) by at least 5.0 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance adjusted close data for TSLA and QQQ, compute % change from 2025-10-22 close to 2025-11-30 close; verify TSLA – QQQ ≤ -5.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: EV pricing and margin commentary from peers
Delivery/production run-rate updates
Rate-sensitive growth factor performance
predictions.rationale: Margin pressure and governance overhangs could weigh on TSLA relative to diversified mega-cap tech.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, OFAC will designate at least one entity for supporting Iranian UAV procurement or production, as evidenced by a Treasury press release or SDN listing explicitly citing UAV-related activity.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm at least one new OFAC press release/SDN entry by the deadline explicitly mentioning Iranian UAV procurement/production facilitation.
monitoring_signals: Reports of UAV transfers to proxies or Russia
U.S. Congressional/State Dept statements on Iran
Tracking of sanctions evasion networks in MENA/Caucasus
predictions.rationale: Escalating regional tensions and ongoing enforcement trends make additional UAV-related designations likely.
